question: Who among the following was the chairman of action committee that was formed as result of convention took place at Tirupathi on 31<sup>st</sup> Dec 1972?
explanation:
During Jai Andhra Movement the congress men of Andhra region met at a convention at Tirupathi with BV Subba Reddi as the president of convention. One of the important decisions taken in the convention was to paralyse state administration without paying taxes.
To implement decision taken in the convention an action committee was constituted under the chairmanship of BV Subba Reddi.
